General.Name: Maple Leaf Green World Inc
General.Description: Maple Leaf Green World Inc. engages in the medical hemp business in Canada and the United States. It develops and processes wellness and health supplement products, such as essential oils and herbal supplements. The company was formerly known as Maple Leaf Reforestation Inc. and changed its name to Maple Leaf Green World Inc. in October 2012. Maple Leaf Green World Inc. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 3515 27 Street NE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T1Y 5E4

1.Name: Mr. Keung Cheung Lam PBA, RPA
1.Title: Corp. Compliance Officer, CFO, Corp. Sec. & Director
